titleStmt.title: To our trusty and well-beloved General Monck to be by him communicated to the President and Council of State, and to the officers of the armies under his command.
titleStmt.author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1660-1685 : Charles II)

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by William Bladen, by special order,

notesStmt.note: Dated at end: at Breda this 4/14 of April 1660. in the 12. year of our reign.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
